content.question: Which of the following historical events most strongly conveys the reasoning behind commemorating Queen Njinga with the statue?

choices.label: The conversion of Aksum to Christianity
Matamba’s reactions to European colonialism in Africa
The prominence and autonomy of Shona kings
Trade connections between Swahili Africa and Asia

content.answer: Matamba’s reactions to European colonialism in Africa

skill.text: 2.B: Describe a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
